snippet: The Minneapolis Institute of Art has arranged to get a major collection of Japanese art from a museum in California, founded by California businessman Willard Clark and his wife, Elizabeth.
abstract: The Minneapolis Institute of Art has arranged to get a major collection of Japanese art from a museum in California, founded by California businessman Willard Clark and his wife, Elizabeth.

headline.main: Minneapolis Museum Gets Major Collection of Japanese Art
headline.print_headline: Minneapolis Museum  Gets Big Japan Collection
